channel.title: How do you change what clothes you start with?
channel.description: Hey, i'm using a decent server, Called KarmaScape. How do you change the starting clothes? Because atm you start with really good stuff.. Like robin hood hat and loads.. Thanks.

item.title: How do you change what clothes you start with?
item.dc:creator: @Jozo4213 Jozo4213
item.source: How do you change what clothes you start with?

item.title: How do you change what clothes you start with?
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

open ‘player.java’
search for //giving the player a
you should get something like this//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1038; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1035; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1033; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

just change the numbers to the ITEM ID of the item you want (’-1’ is nothing)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change what clothes you start with?
